task.summary:
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:clreddy21/PollBanter
Conflicts: README.md
added errors controller for record not found error and internal server errors. precompiled assets.
Added facebook and twitter sharing buttons on poll show page.
Making the image uploaded to a fixed width.
